content: Since https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/80347 is more of a long-term project to spawn smaller PRs and I won't be able to review it in the next 3 months, I'm looking for someone to take this over. The PR is solely about changing our HIR-visitor based metadata output logic with a iterate-all-DefIds-and-call-queries one and should not affect perf by suddenly calling more queries than were necessary before
Looks pretty straightforward? I think I can take it over (if nobody better wants to)
I will reassign it to me, but if anyone "better suited" wants to review it instead, just change it :)

Looks pretty straightforward?

Yea, it's very mechanical, though sometimes nontivial to find out exactly how to prevent additional query calls. But I guess that is up to the author to find out :upside_down:
